title: cmd/godoc: Unable to expand callgraph using chrome
body:
by **doktor@dyregod.dk**: 
Trying to expand the callgraph in Chrome will briefly expand it before collapsing it
again without any user interaction. It works in Safari.

Running godoc with:
godoc -v -analysis=pointer -notes="BUG|TODO" -http=:6060
rev: f3d1213cba73
go version go1.3 darwin/amd64
Chrome: 35.0.1916.153
